title: Unlimited Color and Gradients
subtitle: With Neon-Pro you can capture unlimited colors and gradients.

title: Precise colors from Image
subtitle: Pick colors from exact spots in images.

title: Unlimited Buckets
subtitle: Create and Save unlimited color buckets!

title: Image Pallet Stickers
subtitle: Generate beautiful strips of colors from images and share them anywhere including to your Instagram stories.

title: Alternate App Icons
subtitle: Choose from 9 different app icons and make Neon reflect your personality on your home screen.

title: Random Gradients
subtitle: Swipe through computer generated Random gradients and save any of them to your library to use as your wallpaper or to share anywhere else.

title: iCloud Sync
subtitle: Sync all your captures on all of your devices without performing any set-up. Truly magical.

title: Support Indie Developer
subtitle: This entire app is made and updated by just me. Buying Neon Pro supports me and my efforts in making apps for you. Thank you!
